metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9016 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
In blk_mq_tag_to_rq in blk-mq.c in the upstream kernel, there is a possibleuse after free due to a race condition when a request has been previouslyfreed by blk_mq_complete_request. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID:A-63083046.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-lowlatency - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-13-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-13-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1002-aws - 4.4.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
No subscription required
